overview:
She would like to see the online media industry make it big in the media business. It is not just the “new” alternative in the media business but it become the main alternative in the media business.

She was passionate about online media since she start working in online industry back in 2002. Having a master of communication degree and specialize herself in media studies, she quickly manage to channel her knowledge upon the media and look at internet and website as a cool and exciting media. It’s not only a plain programmer and designer field, its also the game field for a media specialist.

Having a good concept and knowing the strategy to the media have been her experience since 2002.

Her specialties Online media strategic planner
